citation: Nature Conservation (Threatened Native Vegetation Communities) Order 2015 (Tas)
text:
Nature Conservation (Threatened Native Vegetation Communities) Order 2015

I make the following order under section 76A(1) of the Nature Conservation Act 2002 .

29 January 2015

MATTHEW GROOM

Minister for Environment, Parks and Heritage

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Nature Conservation (Threatened Native Vegetation Communities) Order 2015 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Interpretation
    The Acts Interpretation Act 1931 applies to the interpretation of this order as if it were by-laws.

4. Principal Act
    In this order, the Nature Conservation Act 2002 is referred to as the Principal Act.

5.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Nature Conservation Act 2002 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 11 February 2015

This order is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
